data.apiNameCn: 国际PNR最优舱位计算（新版）
data.introduce: 本接口实现了国际基于PNR最优舱位计算，并REB自动更换舱位（RT+QTB+REB）。
data.business: 国际基于PNR最优舱位运价计算，支持REB自动更换舱位。
data.functions:
不支持指定运价基础
不支持指定品牌运价的优价搜索
不支持返回fare total
不支持返回baggage提示信息
不支持返回commission提示信息
SYST FCC在单个运价时无法返回
rate信息无法返回
REB会预定上非HK的航段
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFareBestBuyByPNRRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际PNR最优舱位计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"QTBRequest","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Index","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"需要查询的运价项：当查询的结果多于一条，则输入\"1\"或\"2\"序号以查询运价明细，或者输入“ALL”所有项的运价,输入“NONE”或者不输入该项，对所有运价均不进行明细查询","children":[]},{"name":"Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"币种","children":[]},{"name":"FareType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询类型：正常票价为\"N\"或特殊票价为\"S\",不选择可使用null","children":[]},{"name":"ValidateCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票航空公司","children":[]},{"name":"QueryType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价种类：如(CH),可为空(null/\"\")，此时查询通用票价","children":[]},{"name":"PassType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"小团价","children":[]},{"name":"Rebook","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否应用最优运价：变更舱位","children":[]},{"name":"LowEstOnly","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"仅查询给出的运价折扣种类中的最低运价","children":[]}]}]}]
